componentDescription: Generates the label Gradient for the tooltip and legend.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

gradientId.description: A unique identifier for the gradient. The gradientId will be used as fill="url(#gradientId)".

reverse.description: If true, the gradient will be reversed.

rotate.description: If provided, the gradient will be rotated by 90deg. Useful for linear gradients that are not in the correct orientation.

fill.description: Styles applied to the element filled by the gradient

mask.nodeName: the "mask" that gives shape to the gradient

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
